rows.label: qev051403_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah. Might you be the BLADEs that Zo Zinath has
enjoined to wage battle at our side?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0002
rows.name:
I am Gi Nogan. I have been charged with leading the
defense of this territory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0003
rows.name:
The enemy has broken into several small groups in an
apparent attempt at infiltration.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0004
rows.name:
In order to penetrate this position, our foes will need to
break through the tight passage ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0005
rows.name:
Hence, if we stop them at this passage, we will succeed
in protecting this territory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0006
rows.name: I beg of youâ€”let no foe through![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Gi Nogan that you are ready for battle.

rows.label: qev051403_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Gi Nogan that you need time to prepare.

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0007
rows.name:
I fear the enemy has us greatly outnumbered,
but by using the terrain advantage of the passage,
it should be possible to handle them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0008
rows.name:
I must join with Zo Zinath now.
Valor guide your blade![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0011
rows.name:
The enemy has concentrated its forces for an attack
on this position! We require reinforcements![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0012
rows.name:
We halted most of the main force here, but numerous
units have slipped through and must be intercepted![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0013
rows.name: Withdraw from your position and come at once![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0014
rows.name:
Time is of the essence, for even a moment's hesitation
will result in more foes breaking through![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051403_MSG0015
rows.name: Depart immediately! I repeat, depart immediately![ST:wait ]
